The management reshuffle has been brought about to streamline decision making and create clearer lines of responsibility and accountability at the top of the company, Eric Schmidt said. Some folks have to go the coordinator route to reach the head coaching level, but being in the organization as long as he has, there is a comfort level with him and everyone knows who he is as a coach and a person.
